meanings.definition: The process of converting to the use of diesel fuel.
meanings.sent1: The dieselization of the buses made them more efficient.
meanings.sent2: The dieselization of the trucks reduced their carbon emissions.
meanings.sent3: The dieselization of the old cars brought new life to the fleet.
meanings.sent4: The dieselization of the boats transformed their performance on the water.
meanings.sent5: The dieselization of the generators ensured a reliable power source.

meanings.definition: The act of equipping with a diesel engine.
meanings.sent1: The dieselization of the tractor improved its power.
meanings.sent2: The dieselization of the ship enhanced its speed.
meanings.sent3: The dieselization of the lawnmower made mowing the lawn more exciting.
meanings.sent4: The dieselization of the train gave it a new heart.
meanings.sent5: The dieselization of the car made it roar to life.

meanings.definition: The transition to using diesel power.
meanings.sent1: The dieselization of the factory marked a new era of energy use.
meanings.sent2: The dieselization of the industry changed the landscape of fuel consumption.
meanings.sent3: The dieselization of the school buses turned heads in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The dieselization of the construction site powered progress.
meanings.sent5: The dieselization of the farm equipment revolutionized the work on the farm.
